data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Agnaptoria Reitter from Xizang, China (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae: Blaptini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ren, Guo-Dong, Liu, Hao-Yu (2009): A new species of the genus Agnaptoria Reitter from Xizang, China (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae: Blaptini). Zootaxa 2169: 55-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189178
